data.name: HUMANKIND™ - Music for the Ages, Vol. III
data.detailed_description:
HUMANKIND: Music for the Ages albums features the hours of traditional music from the game’s soundtrack. The 4 volumes of more than 2 hours each, include an extraordinary palette of instruments from around the world, played & improvised by many amazing talented artists.

This is a music album for you to listen outside the game / You don’t need this music DLC to have access to the music in the game

71 tracks. 129 mn. Includes MP3 and FLAC files.

data.short_description: HUMANKIND: Music for the Ages includes hours of traditional music, improvised by many amazing talented artists. The 4 volumes of more than 2 hours each, features an extraordinary palette of instruments from around the world.

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1024 MB available space
